abstract.p: Havas Advertising in Paris acquires Vickers & Benson in Toronto, large company with advertising, direct marketing and interactive operations; financial terms undisclosed (S)

block.p: Havas Advertising in Paris said yesterday that it had acquired Vickers & Benson in Toronto, a large agency company with advertising, direct marketing and interactive operations. Terms were not disclosed.

Vickers & Benson has 225 employees in Canada and Chicago and revenue estimated at $20.9 million from clients like British Airways, McDonald's and Ralston Purina. It will operate as an autonomous unit of the Havas worldwide agency network named Campus. When Havas completes its acquisition of Snyder Communications, scheduled for this month, the big Snyder agency, Arnold Communications, is to be the lead agency of the Campus network.
